field.name: mrsos
field.long_name: Moisture in Upper 0.1 m of Soil Column

field.name: cdrag
field.long_name: Drag coefficient for LE and SH

field.name: reinf_slope
field.long_name: Slope index for each grid box

field.name: basinmap
field.long_name: Aproximate map of the river basins

field.name: nbrivers
field.long_name: Number or rivers in the outflow grid box

field.name: evapnu_soil
field.long_name: Bare soil evap for soil type

field.name: tot_melt
field.long_name: Total melt from ice and snow

field.name: soilcap
field.long_name: Surface heat capacity considering snow and soil surface

field.name: frac_bare
field.long_name: Bare soil fraction for each tile

field.name: gpp
field.long_name: Net assimilation of carbon by the vegetation

field.name: delfastr
field.long_name: Accumulated difference for current time step for fast flow reservoir

field.name: delfastr_daily
field.long_name: Mean over difference in fast flow reservoir accumulated over each day

field.name: delslowr
field.long_name: Accumulated difference for current time step for slow flow reservoir

field.name: delslowr_daily
field.long_name: Mean over difference for slow flow reservoir accumulated over each day

field.name: delstreamr
field.long_name: Accumulated difference for current time step for stream flow reservoir

field.name: delstreamr_daily
field.long_name: Mean over difference in stream flow reservoir accumulated each day

field.name: dellakevol
field.long_name: Accumulated difference for current time step for volume in lake reservoir

field.name: dellakevol_daily
field.long_name: Mean over difference for volume in lake reservoir accumulated each day

field.name: delpondr
field.long_name: Accumulated difference for current time step for ponds reservoir

field.name: delpondr_daily
field.long_name: Mean over difference for ponds reservoir accumulated over each day

field.name: delfloodr
field.long_name: Accumulated difference for current time step for floodplains reservoir

field.name: delfloodr_daily
field.long_name: Mean over difference for floodplains reservoir accumulated over each day

field.name: TotWater
field.long_name: Total amount of water at end of time step

field.name: residualFrac
field.long_name: Fraction of Grid Cell that is Land but Neither Vegetation-Covered nor Bare Soil

field.name: PAR
field.long_name: Photosynthetic active radiation, half of swdown

field.name: PARsuntab
field.long_name: PAR received by sun leaves over LAI layers

field.name: PARshtab
field.long_name: PAR received by shaded leaves over LAI layers

field.name: coszang
field.long_name: Cosine of the solar zenith angle

field.name: CRF
field.long_name: Canopy reduction factor for net NO flux calculation

field.name: flx_co2_bbg_year
field.long_name: CO2 emissions from biomass burning - Read in an input file

field.name: N_qt_WRICE_year
field.long_name: N fertilizers applied on wetland rice - Read in an input file

field.name: N_qt_OTHER_year
field.long_name: N fertilizers applied on other crops and grasses - Read in an input file

field.name: flx_ORVOC
field.long_name: Other Volatile Organic Compound emissions from vegetation

field.name: flx_MBO
field.long_name: 2-methyl-3-buten-2-ol emissions from vegetation (mainly pines in America)

field.name: flx_othermono
field.long_name: Emissions of other monoterpenes from vegetation

field.name: flx_fertil_no
field.long_name: Biogenic nitrogen oxide soil emission due to N-fertilisation

field.name: flx_no_soil
field.long_name: Nitrogen Oxide emissions from soil, before deposition on canopy

field.name: flx_no
field.long_name: Net nitrogen Oxide emissions from soil, after deposition on canopy

field.name: fco2
field.long_name: Function for CO2 impact on BVOC (isoprene)

field.name: SoilSat
field.long_name: Mean volumetric water content at saturation

field.name: DelSurfHeat
field.long_name: Accumulated change in surface layer heat

field.name: DelColdCont
field.long_name: Accumulated change in snow surface layer cold content

field.name: Qsb_corrnum
field.long_name: Adjustement flux added to drainage (numerical errors in tridiag)

field.name: DelSoilMoist_daily
field.long_name: Mean for change in soil moisture acumulated over each day.

field.name: DelSurfStor
field.long_name: Accumulated change in Surface Water Storage

field.name: DelIntercept_daily
field.long_name: Mean for change in interception storage accumulated over each day

field.name: DelSWE
field.long_name: Accumulated change in Snow Water Equivalent

field.name: DelSWE_daily
field.long_name: Mean for change in Snow Water Equivalent accumulated over each day

field.long_name: Frozen fraction for each hydrological soil layer average over soil types

field.name: ONSET_DATE
field.long_name: The day in the year when leaves start to grow

field.name: MAXFPC_LASTYEAR
field.long_name: Foliage projective cover of last year

field.name: CO2_TAKEN
field.long_name: CO2 taken from atmosphere for initiate growth

field.name: TOTAL_BM_LITTER
field.long_name: total conversion of biomass to litter

field.name: DEADLEAF_COVER
field.long_name: fraction of soil covered by dead leaves

field.name: BM_ALLOC_SAP_AB
field.long_name: biomass allocated to sapwood above ground

field.name: BM_ALLOC_SAP_BE
field.long_name: biomass allocated to sapwood below ground

field.name: FLUX10
field.long_name: annual flux for each 10 year wood product pool

field.name: FLUX100
field.long_name: annual flux for each 100 year wood product pool

field.name: CFLUX_PROD10
field.long_name: annual release from all 10 year wood product pools

field.name: CFLUX_PROD100
field.long_name: annual release from all 100 year wood product pools

field.name: FIREDEATH
field.long_name: Fraction of plants killed by fire

field.name: LIGHT_DEATH
field.long_name: Fraction of plants that dies (light competition)

field.name: NCD_DORMANCE
field.long_name: Number of chilling days, since leaves were lost

field.name: ALLOW_INITPHENO
field.long_name: Allow to declare beginning of the growing season

field.name: BEGIN_LEAVES
field.long_name: Signal to start putting leaves on

field.name: cProduct
field.long_name: Carbon in Products of Land Use Change

field.name: fHarvest
field.long_name: CO2 Flux to Atmosphere from Crop Harvesting

field.name: fLuc
field.long_name: CO2 Flux to Atmosphere from Land Use Change

field.name: fVegLitter
field.long_name: Total Carbon Flux from Vegetation to Litter

field.name: fLitterSoil
field.long_name: Total Carbon Flux from Litter to Soil

field.name: treeFracPrimDec
field.long_name: Total Primary Deciduous Tree Cover Fraction

field.name: treeFracPrimEver
field.long_name: Total Primary Evergreen Tree Cover Fraction

field.name: nppLeaf
field.long_name: CO2 Flux from Atmosphere due to NPP Allocation to Leaf

field.name: nppWood
field.long_name: CO2 Flux from Atmosphere due to NPP Allocation to Wood

field.name: nppRoot
field.long_name: CO2 Flux from Atmosphere due to NPP Allocation to Root

field.name: nep
field.long_name: Net Carbon Mass Flux out of Atmophere due to Net Ecosystem Productivity.

field.name: undermcr
field.long_name: Number of soiltiles under residual moisture

field.name: check_tr
field.long_name: check water conservation of tridiag with diag_tr2

field.name: Qs_corr
field.long_name: Adjustement flux added to surface runoff

field.name: Qs_corr2
field.long_name: Adjustement flux added to surface runoff (case of negative surface runoff)

field.name: Qforce
field.long_name: Adjustement flux added to drainage to sustain a forced water table depth
